title: Humboldt on Colonial Mexican Society Q3

content.question: Which of the following most strongly contributed to the formation of new ethnic groups of the type mentioned in the passage in the Americas between circa 1500 and 1750 ?

choices.label: The expansion of Jesuit missionary activity
Increasing trade links with Asia that were fostered by the global silver trade
The development of the Atlantic trading system

content.answer: The development of the Atlantic trading system

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
